story_parts.text: The lion was very excited to go to Disney World. He had always wanted to go and see all the characters. When he got there, he was so excited to see Mickey Mouse and all his friends.

story_parts.text: He is so happy to finally be at Disney World and can't wait to explore everything the park has to offer. He immediately goes to get a fast pass for the Seven Dwarfs Mine Train ride and then goes to line up for a photo with Mickey Mouse.

story_parts.text: The line for the photo is incredibly long, but he doesn't mind because he is just so excited to be at Disney World. Finally, it's his turn to take the photo and he is beaming from ear to ear as he stands next to Mickey Mouse.

story_parts.text: The photographer hands him the photo and he looks at it in disbelief. The photo is of him and Mickey Mouse, but Mickey Mouse is just a head on a stick. He can't believe that his photo is ruined and he starts to cry.

next_options.0: The photographer tries to console the man, telling him that the photo can still be salvageable
